Class BudgeteerSQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • Budgeteer
      • BudgeteerSQL

  • public class BudgeteerSQL
extends Budgeteer
    This object inherits the budgeteer properties and holds all the SQL methods for returning data from the SQL tables using the budgeteer properties
    Author:
    student
